sqlMap.sql: select u.PRD_RETURN_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_ID, u.RETURN_CHANN_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.EXPECT_RETURNDATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') EXPECT_RETURNDATE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from ERP_PRD_RETURN u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM ERP_PRD_RETURN u
sqlMap.delete: update ERP_PRD_RETURN set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.PRD_RETURN_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_NO, u.BILL_TYPE, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_ID, u.RETURN_CHANN_NO, u.RETURN_CHANN_NAME, u.RECV_CHANN_ID, u.RECV_CHANN_NO, u.RECV_CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.EXPECT_RETURNDATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') EXPECT_RETURNDATE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from ERP_PRD_RETURN u where u.PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID, u.PRD_RETURN_ID, u.FROM_BILL_DTL_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.SPCL_TECH_ID, u.RETURN_PRICE, u.RETURN_NUM, u.RETURN_AMOUNT, u.RETURN_RSON_TYPE, u.RETURN_RSON, u.RETURN_ATT, u.DUTY_DECIDE, u.PRICE_DECIDE, u.REAL_RETURN_AMOUNT, u.REMARK_DECIDE, u.DEAL_FACTORY_ID, u.DEAL_FACTORY_NAME, u.DECIDE_PSON_ID, u.DECIDE_PSON_NAME, to_char(u.DECIDE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') DECIDE_TIME, u.DECIDE_FLAG, u.DEL_FLAG, p.PAR_PRD_NAME, a.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO from ERP_PRD_RETURN_DTL u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on u.SPCL_TECH_ID = a.SPCL_TECH_ID left join BASE_PRODUCT p on u.PRD_ID = p.PRD_ID
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_PRD_RETURN_DTL( PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID, PRD_RETURN_ID, DEL_FLAG )values( #PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID#, #PRD_RETURN_ID#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.delete: update ERP_PRD_RETURN_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where PRD_RETURN_DTL_ID in ($PRD_RETURN_DTL_IDS$)
update ERP_PRD_RETURN_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where PRD_RETURN_ID = #PRD_RETURN_ID:VARCHAR#
